Description.Text: Hotel Asmali consists of 16 rooms including a Suite Room with sea view and jacuzzi also Standard and Deluxe Rooms which are decorated with ancient Turkish style. The rooms are pretty wide and comfortable with double or separated beds and sitting groups. Hotel Asmali was built on the historical peninsula "Sultan Ahmet" in 1946 in the use of a mansion. In 2007, the family members restored the mansion without changing its architecture and style. The hotel carries all of the specialties of Turkish mansions.This historical mansion is restored by the help of modern architecture and the result is a highly comfortable modern hotel which is full of history. The goal in Hotel Asmali is to show you the edge of Turkish hospitality and make you feel comfortable as much as the hotel can during your vacation.The hotel will be honored to welcome you with its qualified employees. The hotel also offers lobby, reception, terrace and smoke free hotel.

Hotel Asmali is located in Sultahanet which is the most historical place of Istanbul. It is located within walking distance of most of the major sites such as Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace, St.Sophia, Grand Bazaar and other major sites.

Standard Double Room - Standard Double Room offers one double bed or two single beds with air conditioning, alarm clock, balcony / terrace, bathrobe, private bathroom, cable / satellite TV, CD player, color TV, DVD player, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, modem / data port connection, non-smoking rooms, radio, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone. Approximately 15m to 20m. City view from rooms Classical Turkish style decor. Complimentary Services ( Free) in Standard Rooms: High-speed wireless internet connection, Complimentary water in minibar (daily 2x 0.5lt), and Slippers and bathroom amenities and hairdryer.
Deluxe Double / Twin Room - Deluxe Double / Twin Room offers one double bed or two twin beds with air conditioning, alarm clock, balcony / terrace, bathrobe, private bathroom, cable / satellite TV, CD player, color TV, DVD player, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, modem / data port connection, non-smoking rooms, radio, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone. This special room has been furnished with the best quality of Ottoman style ; including separate sitting area and offer city view. Approximately 17m to 23m. Extra bed possibility for triple accommodation. Complimentary Services ( Free) in Deluxe Rooms: High-speed wireless internet connection, Complimentary water in minibar (daily 2x 0.5lt), Slippers, Bathrobe and bathroom amenities, hairdryer, Tea and coffee making facilities (kattle), and Complimentary wine (75cl) and Fruit Basket upon arrival.
Basement Double or Twin - This room is located one floor below the entrance level, in the basement, with following Room Facilities: Slippers, Bath or Shower, TV, Safety Deposit Box, Air Conditioning, Heating, Wooden / Parquet floor, Hairdryer, Free toiletries, Toilet, Bathroom, Telephone, Radio, DVD Player, Cable TV, Tea/Coffee Maker, Minibar, Wake Up Service/Alarm Clock, Wake Up Service
